# Treasury â€“ Risk Boundaries

## Risk Scope
Treasury risk includes:
- Liquidity risk
- Funding risk
- Concentration risk

## Boundary Rules
- Risk assessment must be independent of execution logic.
- Treasury must not bypass risk or compliance controls.
- Risk thresholds must be explicit and documented.

## Prohibited
- Embedded risk logic within cash movement execution
- Undocumented risk limit changes
- Silent risk threshold breaches
